text:
@TheDemocrats CNN and MSNBC:

“The top seven cities having new spikes in COVID-19 opened up too early!”

“This is Trumps fault. All he cares about is the economy and his rallies!”

Me: Here’s your TOP cities. *wink

BTW, New York, Atlanta and Chicago have more deaths by gunfire than COVID-19..
